title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 10.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 10.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Article 12-D of the Vehicle and Traffic Law permits the

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to allow approved sponsors of internet accident
prevention courses to use the internet for the administration and completion of
an approved pre-licensing course, which shall be deemed the equivalent of the
pre-licensing course required by section
502
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. The pilot program shall continue until June 30, 2025. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
10.1

Adopted

New

York State Register June 17, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 24, eff. 6/17/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
